TopicTitle: [Artwork] want me to make you a .gif?

Articles.Content:
Whats i .gif? well a smiley like this: ;P is a gif, in other words its like a slideshow.

want me to make you one? PM me.

Heres the first ever gif i made:
Great! Needs to be sped up a little tho!

Great! Needs to be sped up a little tho!

Sure, ill do that now!

EDIT:

sped up version:

Fastest i can go:

Last one is great

Now make it crash and explode in a giant cartoony fireball!

Got it:

what do you think?
All of them are horrible. White stripes around the SRB, the explosion isnt cut out either.

It\'s...

It should be a lot faster, you should have a lot more pictures in it to make it seem less slideshow-ey and the explosion looks like you cut it out of a comic.

All of them are horrible. White stripes around the SRB, the explosion isnt cut out either.

Now to turn this statement into \'constructive\' criticism.

The SRB and the explosion still have their backgrounds, making them unappealing to see. If you have Paint.NET [some free art software], you can use the \'Magic Wand\' tool to select the unwanted parts of the image, then delete it. You would then have a much better looking image to work with. Use layers so the cut background doesn\'t interfere with the image of the plane.
If you can make this go faster and look more smooth, I will be eternally grateful.

Now to turn this statement into \'constructive\' criticism.

The SRB and the explosion still have their backgrounds, making them unappealing to see. If you have Paint.NET [some free art software], you can use the \'Magic Wand\' tool to select the unwanted parts of the image, then delete it. You would then have a much better looking image to work with. Use layers so the cut background doesn\'t interfere with the image of the plane.

Thanks, also about the speeding up feature, thats as fast as i can go.
